Quick search

Enter search terms or a module, class or function name.

modelicaresÂ¶

Set up Modelica simulations and load, analyze, and plot the results.

This module provides direct access to the most important functions and classes from its submodules. These are:

  • Supporting or auxiliary classes and functions: aux.add_arrows(), aux.add_hlines(), aux.add_vlines(), aux.animate(), aux.ArrowLine, aux.closeall(), aux.figure(), aux.load_csv(), aux.saveall(), aux.setup_subplots()
  • To manage simulation experiments: exps.Experiment, exps.gen_experiments(), exps.ParamDict, exps.read_params(), exps.run_models(), exps.write_params(), exps.write_script()
  • To handle multiple files at once: multi.multiload(), multi.multiplot()
  • For linearization results: linres.LinRes
  • For linearization results: simres.SimRes
  • To label numbers and quantities: texunit.label_number(), texunit.label_quantity(), texunit.unit2tex()
